alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:16PM EDT until June 17 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 515 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Quincy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Quincy, Havana, Greensboro, Gretna, Douglas City, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Jamieson, Miccosukee, Griffin Heights, Quincy Airport, Sawdust, Midtown, Levy Park, Mount Pleasant, Baum, Orchard Pond and Maclay State Gardens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
